anathema: Sow discord among friends and allies, attack during parley
edict: Attempt to bridge the gap between feuding sides, maintain just treaties, maintain relations with neighbors
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Grundinnar (The Peacemaker)](/Deities.aspx?ID=514)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 312

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dead or Missing Deities](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=34)

**Edicts** Attempt to bridge the gap between feuding sides, maintain just treaties, maintain relations with neighbors

**Anathema** Sow discord among friends and allies, attack during parley

**Area of Concern**
Alliance, family, friendship, truth

**Pantheons**
[Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Hammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=384)

**Domains** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=95)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=116)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Anticipate Peril](/Spells.aspx?ID=2343)

- **4th**
[Containment](/Spells.aspx?ID=1981)

- **6th**
[Wall of Force](/Spells.aspx?ID=1749)

</column>
name: Grundinnar (The Peacemaker)
